name: Qwen Image Editor Kie AI
description:
Edits an input image based on a text prompt using the Qwen Image Edit model via the kie.ai API. Generates up to 4 images at once.
Pricing (as of November 2025): â‰ˆ $0.03 per megapixel, depending on the image aspect ratio.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

num_images.description: Optional number of images to generate. Must be 1-4. Defaults to 1

filename.description: Optional base filename for the created image(s) (without extension). Defaults to None (uses task_id)

output_format.description: Optional format for the created image. Must be one of 'jpeg', 'png'. Defaults to 'png'

image_size.description: Optional size for the created image. Must be one of 'square', 'square_hd', 'portrait_4_3', 'portrait_16_9', 'landscape_4_3', 'landscape_16_9'. Defaults to 'landscape_4_3'

num_inference_steps.description: Optional number of inference steps to perform. Min 2, max 49, step 1. Default value: 30

input_image_path.description: Required full local path to the input image to edit. Accepted types: .jpeg, .png, and .webp. Max size : 10MB

prompt.description: The text prompt describing how to edit the image. Max length : 2000 characters

acceleration.description: Acceleration level for image generation. Options: 'none', 'regular', 'high'. Higher acceleration increases speed. 'regular' balances speed and quality. Default value: 'none'

negative_prompt.description: Optional negative prompt to avoid in image editing. Max length : 500 characters. Defaults to None (omit if not provided)

seed.description: Optional integer for random seed to control generation; defaults to None (omit if not provided). The same seed and the same prompt given to the same version of the model will output the same image every time.

guidance_scale.description: Optional. The CFG (Classifier Free Guidance) scale is a measure of how close you want the model to stick to your prompt when looking for a related image to show you. Default value: 4, min 0, max 20, step 0.1

enable_safety_checker.description: Wether to enable the safety checker. If set to true, the safety checker will be enabled. Defaults to False.

saved_images_paths.description: List of local paths where the generated images are saved

status.description: The status of the operation (success, error, etc.)

task_id.description: The ID of the created task

temporary_image_urls.description: List of temporary URLs for the generated images
